message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $175. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $125?

Hey Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $125 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. Would you be willing to go up to $140? It's still a great deal for a product of this quality.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am unable to meet the current offer. Could we possibly settle at $135?
